items.title: European leaders set to hold emergency summit on Ukraine
items.description: The UK PM, who is expected to attend, said it was a "once in a generation moment for our national security".

items.title: Eighteen killed in New Delhi station crush
items.description: Eyewitnesses tell the BBC a "huge crowd" had gathered at the Indian capital's central train station.

items.title: Why Uganda's iconic crested crane faces extinction
items.description: The population of the national bird is declining partly due to encroachment on wetlands by farmers.

items.title: Raisins or not? Pudding debate splits island nation
items.description: The debate over a beloved dish has reignited as Antiguans and Barbudans seek to preserve their cultural heritage.

items.title: Base full of mouldy food and secret documents: Iranâ€™s rapid retreat from Syria
items.description: The BBC examines the chaos left behind after Iran had to abandon its military bases in Syria.
